oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Wm. P. Sanders
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hoag & Quick's Art Palac
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: William P. Sanders. Col. 5th Ky. Cav., Chief of Cav., Dept. of the Ohio, Brig. Gen. US. KIA 11/63. Taken by Hoag & Quick's Art Palace, No. 100 4th St. opp Post Office, Cincinnati, OH. William Price Sanders was an officer in the Union Army during the Civil War. He died at the Siege of Knoxville in November 1863.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Portraits; Military officers; Military uniforms; Civil wars;
